languages.text: Провидец Муаран встал во главе собратьев в битве против мон-кай. Так и не сумев преодолеть ненависть к ним за время сосуществования, он кровью смыл горечь потери со своего сердца, а затем покинул переродившийся Лилэтан.

The Farseer Muaran led his kin in battle against the mon-keigh. He was not able to overcome his hatred for them, and he washed the bitterness of loss from his heart with blood before leaving the transformed Lilaethan behind.
languages.original_text: Провидец Муаран встал во главе собратьев в битве против мон-кай. Так и не сумев преодолеть ненависть к ним за время сосуществования, он кровью смыл горечь потери со своего сердца, а затем покинул переродившийся Лилэтан.

traits.locale_text: Farseer Muaran lad his brethren against the mon-keigh. He was not able to overcome his hatred towards them, and he washed away the bitterness from of heart with blood and left a transformed Lilaethan.

The Farseer Muaran led his kin in battle against the mon-keigh. He was not able to overcome his hatred for them, and he washed the bitterness of loss from his heart with blood before leaving the transformed Lilaethan behind.

languages.text: 先知穆兰率领他的族人攻击了猴子，他无法抑制自己对他们的仇恨。他以猴子的鲜血洗去了心中的故土之痛，之后离开了面目全非的莉莱赞。
languages.original_text: The Farseer Muaran led his kin in battle against the mon-keigh. He was not able to overcome his hatred for them, and he washed the bitterness of loss from his heart with blood before leaving the transformed Lilaethan behind.

traits.locale_text: 先知穆兰率领他的族人攻击了猴子，他无法抑制自己对他们的仇恨。他以猴子的鲜血洗去了心中的故土之痛，之后离开了面目全非的莉莱赞。

languages.text: Der Runenprophet Muaran führte sein Volk in den Kampf gegen Chem-Pan-Sey. Er konnte seinen Hass gegen sie nie überwinden, und er spülte die Verbitterung über seinen Verlust mit Blut von seinem Herzen, bevor er die verwandelte Lileath-Welt hinter sich ließ.
languages.original_text: The Farseer Muaran led his kin in battle against the mon-keigh. He was not able to overcome his hatred for them, and he washed the bitterness of loss from his heart with blood before leaving the transformed Lilaethan behind.

traits.locale_text: Der Runenprophet Muaran führte seine Sippe in den Kampf gegen die Chem-Pan-Sey. Er konnte seinen Hass gegen sie nie überwinden, und er spülte die Verbitterung über seinen Verlust mit Blut von seinem Herzen, bevor er die verwandelte Lileath-Welt hinter sich ließ.

languages.text: Le Grand Prophète Muaran lança ses semblables au combat contre les mon-keigh. Incapable de surmonter sa haine à leur égard, il lava l'amertume de son cœur dans leur sang avant d'abandonner une lilaethan à jamais transformée.
languages.original_text: The Farseer Muaran led his kin in battle against the mon-keigh. He was not able to overcome his hatred for them, and he washed the bitterness of loss from his heart with blood before leaving the transformed Lilaethan behind.

traits.locale_text: Le Grand Prophète Muaran lança ses semblables contre les mon-keigh. Incapable de surmonter sa haine à leur égard, il lava l'amertume de son cœur avec leur sang avant d'abandonner une lilaethan à jamais transformée.

languages.text: El vidente Muaran dirigió a los suyos en batalla contra los mon-keigh. No pudo superar su odio hacia ellos, y lavó con sangre la amargura de su derrota antes de abandonar el Lilaethan transformado.
languages.original_text: The Farseer Muaran led his kin in battle against the mon-keigh. He was not able to overcome his hatred for them, and he washed the bitterness of loss from his heart with blood before leaving the transformed Lilaethan behind.

traits.locale_text: El vidente Muaran dirigió a los suyos contra los mon-keigh. No pudo superar su odio hacia ellos, y lavó con sangre la amargura de su derrota antes de abandonar el Lilaethan transformado.

languages.text: 先見司のムアランは同族を率いてモン＝ケイに対峙した。彼はモン＝ケイへの憎しみを乗り越えることができず、喪失にあえぐ心を血で洗ったのちに、変わり果てたリラエタンを後にしたのだ。
languages.original_text: The Farseer Muaran led his kin in battle against the mon-keigh. He was not able to overcome his hatred for them, and he washed the bitterness of loss from his heart with blood before leaving the transformed Lilaethan behind.

traits.locale_text: 先見司のムアランは同族を率いてモン＝ケイに対峙した。彼はモン＝ケイへの憎しみを乗り越えることができず、喪失にあえぐ心を血で洗ったのちに、変わり果てたリラエタンを後にしたのだ。

languages.text: Ötesezen Muaran, soydaşlarını mon-keighlere saldırttı. Onlara duyduğu nefreti aşmayı başaramayınca kaybının acısını, kan ile yıkayıp kalbinden attı. Sonrasında ise başka bir şeye dönüşmüş olan Lilaethan'ı arkasında bırakarak oradan ayrıldı.
languages.original_text: The Farseer Muaran led his kin in battle against the mon-keigh. He was not able to overcome his hatred for them, and he washed the bitterness of loss from his heart with blood before leaving the transformed Lilaethan behind.

traits.locale_text: Ötesezen Muaran soydaşlarını mon-keighlere saldırttı. Onlara duyduğu nefreti aşmayı başaramamıştı ve kaybının acısını, kalbinden kan ile yıkayıp attı. Ardından başka bir şeye dönüşmüş olan Lilaethan'ı arkasında bırakarak oradan ayrıldı.
